definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: The Syrian government launched a violent campaign against pro-democracy protesters in March.
sentences.chinese: 敘利亞政府三月份對主張民主的示威者展開暴力鎮壓。

sentences.english: In March, Hareton had had an accident and been confined to the farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 三月份，哈里頓發生了一起事故，並被囚禁在了農舍。

sentences.english: Exhumations are to begin when the ground thaws, probably in March.
sentences.chinese: 掘墓工作很可能在三月份土地解凍時開始。

sentences.english: We spent most of March ploughing.
sentences.chinese: 三月份的大部分時間我們在春耕。

sentences.english: But in March came big event number one, and it had nothing to do with sport.
sentences.chinese: 但是在三月份發生的頭件大事卻與體育運動無關。

sentences.english: Markets have rallied very fast, but they fell just as quickly in the six months to March.
sentences.chinese: 市場在三月份前的的六個月裏乍然回暖又驟然降溫。

sentences.english: And I think the new season starts in March, right?
sentences.chinese: 而且我認爲新的一季從三月份開始，對嗎？

sentences.english: Ah Seng saved RM460 in March.
New loans were a more-than-estimated 679.4 billion yuan ($104 billion) in March, it said.
sentences.chinese: 而且三月份的新增貸款6794億元，數字高於預期。

sentences.english: This trip to the Baikal was made by several Russian men in March of this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年三月份，一羣俄羅斯人步上了貝加爾湖之旅。

sentences.english: In March, China’s Zhejiang Geely Holding Group set itself up for the ultimate safety challenge.
sentences.chinese: 三月份，中國浙江吉利控股集團展開終極安全挑戰。
三月份是職業道德宣傳月。

sentences.english: In March, a district judge in New York said the arbitration could proceed.
sentences.chinese: 因三月份紐約一個地區法官曾同意該案進入仲裁程序。

sentences.english: In March the old woman dies in her sleep.
sentences.chinese: 三月份，老太太睡着睡着覺就死了。

sentences.english: The March figure for output value registered a 37 per cent increase over February.
sentences.chinese: 三月份產值比二月份增長百分之三十七。
